thread.title: Tests show no serious injury to Jordan Clarkson's shoulder, but he's uncertain for Lakers' opener
thread.title_full: Tests show no serious injury to Jordan Clarkson's shoulder, but he's uncertain for Lakers' opener

author: JANIS CARR
title: Tests show no serious injury to Jordan Clarkson's shoulder, but he's uncertain for Lakers' opener
text: Tests show no serious injury to Jordan Clarkson's shoulder, but he's uncertain for Lakers' opener Oct. 23, 2015 Updated 4:31 p.m. 1 of 1 After leaving Thursday’s preseason finale with a sore shoulder, Lakers guard Jordan Clarkson is listed as day-to-day. The team opens its season Wednesday. JAE C. HONG , JAE C. HONG, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS After leaving Thursday’s preseason finale with a sore shoulder, Lakers guard Jordan Clarkson is listed as day-to-day. The team opens its season Wednesday. JAE C. HONG , JAE C. HONG, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS
